sentences.sContent: We are like two parallel lines that never face up to each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are like two parallel lines that never face up to each other.
sentences.sCn: 我门像是两条平行线永远不能坦白面对面。

sentences.sContent: Life is a parallel lines, one is the real life, one is the inner world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life is a parallel lines, one is the real life, one is the inner world.
sentences.sCn: 人生就是条平行线，一个是真实生活，一个是内心世界。 。

sentences.sContent: Thee teacher was apparently teaching his geometry students about parallel lines and angles, officials said. He used the example of where to stand and aim if shooting Obama.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thee teacher was apparently teaching his geometry students about parallel lines and angles, officials said. He used the example of where to stand and aim if shooting Obama.
sentences.sCn: 这名老师在讲解平行线和角度的时候，以刺杀总统为例，告诉学生如果要行刺，应该如何选择地点和角度。 。
